title: Obstetric Emergencies
role_in_edaitutor: Obstetric reference for pregnancy-related emergencies including hypertensive disorders, bleeding, labour complications, and postpartum emergencies.

chapters.chapter_title: Approach to the Pregnant Patient in the ED
chapters.summary: Covers initial ED assessment of pregnant patients with focus on maternal and foetal well-being.
Summarises evaluation of first trimester complications.
Describes recognition and management of pregnancy-related hypertensive disorders.
Outlines acute management of labour complications and postpartum emergencies in the ED.
